artist: Artist: Migita Toshihide; Publisher: Akiyama Buemon
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; battle scene taking place on the deck of a ship; group of soldiers in black naval uniforms, firing a cannon; plumes of white smoke on right image; orange explosion in ULQ of center image; white, rectangular banner with text, both in English and in Japanese characters in URQ of right image; male officer, giving command, raising PR hand on left image
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper with burnishing
title: Picture of the Hard Fight of Commander Yamanaka, Chief Gunner of Our Warship Fuji, in the Naval Battle at the Entrance of Port Arthur
